values.description: Base URL for API requests. Change to https://seatrace.worldseafoodproducers.com for production demo
EMR service authentication token. Obtain from private repo: run `python SeaTrace-ODOO-Private/demo/scripts/gen_demo_token.py`
Default organization for testing. Options: bluewave, pelagic, northstar
Sample vessel ID for testing. Bluewave vessels: bl-001 to bl-004, Pelagic: pe-001 to pe-004, Northstar: no-001 to no-004
